results.content: This course materials are very organized and well explained. The instructor shows us how to implement a Spring security feature step by step. Even if we don't have much prerequisite knowledge about Spring security, we can follow him comfortably.

results.content:
Excellent course. I have purchased other Spring Boot and Spring Security courses for learning how to apply the Web Authentication in my project and I got lost because of poor explanation and juggling from topic to topic without a clear learning strategy. 
This course is has done a great job and I liked the source code documentation with references very much with each video.
